scripts.bundle: rm -rf dist && bun run conc  --raw "bun panda" "bun run bundle:js"
scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && bun panda && bun run conc --raw --kill-others "bun panda --watch" "bun run dev:js"
scripts.dev:js: bun run nodemon --exec='bun run scripts/bundle.ts && DEBUG=* bun --hot ./src/server.ts'
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production bun run bundle && COMPRESSION_ENABLED=1 NODE_ENV=production bun run dist/server.js
